rules_text:
This creature can’t be blocked.
This creature enters with a +1/+1 counter on it if you didn’t cast it from your hand.
Suspend 2–{U} [i](Rather than casting this, you may pay {U} to exile it with two time counters. At your upkeep, remove one. When the last is removed, cast it for free. It has haste.)[/i]
